unnormalised: Arre baba, insurance policyo kitle doka ditaat, na? Mhoje chachan LIC-ichean ₹5 lakh-anchi Jeevan Bima Policy '05 vorsa ghetli. To aplem retirementak puro mhunn chintun aslo. Pun atam, inflation ani soglleim mellun, ₹5L khuim tori komi dista, na? Tannem odik sum assured gheunk zai aslem, kiteak tor Rs. 20,00,000 poriant. Ani tannem fokot 15 vorsam khatir ghetlem! Tannem aplem retirement planning poilim korunk zai aslem.
normalised: Arre baba, insurance policyo kitli dok dukhi dita, nhoi? Mhojea chacha-n L-I-C kadlean Jeevan Bima Policy rupia panch lakh-achi don hazar ani panch-an ghethlhi. To sodthalo apunn retire zavche poile sabar zata mhunn. Punn atam, vadhthik vadhichek lagun, rupia panch lakh barich thode mhunn dista, nhoi? Tannem vadhik sum assured gheunk zay aslem, kiteak rupia vis lakh zagear. Ani tannem barach pondhra vorsank ghetlem! Tannem apli retirement planning poile karunk zai asli.
